data.expected_result: The search field isn't supposed to be scrollable.
data.short_description: When using search tool in Microsoft Edge, the search field allows me to move the query's position as it were a scrolling box
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord in Microsoft Edge - Go into a Discord server - Use CTRL+F to open the search box - Type anything into the field and search for it - Select the text and hold it, but then move mouse up and down
